default date: Defaults to 60 days from today if not provided.
announcements.school.announcements_text: This is announcements page. Here you can view the list of all the announcements added by the school. Also you can view details, edit and delete the announcements.
announcements.school.add_text: On clicking this button, you can be able to add a new announcement. You can add announcements like holiday, general, exam and others.
announcements.school.search_text: Here you can search announcements by title, description and announcement type.
clubs.school.tour.clubs_text: This is the clubs and activities page. Here you can view the list of all the clubs and activities added by the school.
clubs.school.tour.add_text: Click this button to add a new club or activity. You can specify details like name, description, meeting time, and contact person.
clubs.school.tour.search_text: Use this search box to find clubs by name, description, or other details.
events.school.tour.events_text: This is events page. Here you can view all the events that are created by the school. All completed, ongoing and upcoming events are listed here.
events.school.tour.filter_text: Here you can customize the calendar according to your choice. Like if you want to see the events of this week instead of the month, then you can change that accordingly.
events.school.tour.add_text: By clicking on this button, you can be able to add a new event. You can add events like competitions, opening days, closing days, guest lectures etc.
events.school.tour.filter_events_text: By using this you can filter events. Like if you want to list only the competitions, you can perform that using this feature.
applications.school.tour.applications_te: This is Form applications page. Here you can view the list of all the applications submitted by the user for admissions.
applications.school.tour.search_text: Here you can search applications by title, description and announcement type.
applications.school.tour.filter_text: On clicking these filter buttons, you can filter the form applications by their status.
joboffers.school.tour.job_offers_text: This page lists all job offers posted by your school. You can view, add, and manage job offers here.
joboffers.school.tour.add_text: Click this button to add a new job offer. You can enter position, description, salary, and more.
joboffers.school.tour.search_text: Use this search box to find job offers by position, description, or location.
psychological_supports.school.tour.suppo: This page lists all psychological support contacts and their office hours for your school.
psychological_supports.school.tour.add_t: Click this button to add a new psychological support contact, including name, contact number, and office hours.
psychological_supports.school.tour.searc: Use this search box to find psychological support contacts by name or contact number.
sos_alerts.school.tour.sos_alerts_text: This is SOS alerts page. Here you can view all the SOS alerts created by school.
sos_alerts.school.tour.add_text: Here you can add a new alerts. You can add alerts of type emergency, fire drill, instruction, medical emergency, weather alert etc.
sos_alerts.school.tour.search_text: Here you can search alerts by their title, description and type.
students.school.tour.students_text: This page lists all students added to your school. You can view, add, or import students here.
students.school.tour.add_text: Click this button to add a new student. You can enter their name and mobile number.
students.school.tour.import_text: Click this button to import students in bulk using a CSV or Excel file.
students.school.tour.search_text: Use this search box to find students by name or mobile number.
restaurant_announcements.tour.table_text: This table shows all the announcements for your restaurant. You can add, edit, or delete announcements here.
restaurant_announcements.tour.search_tex: Use this box to search for announcements by title, description, etc.
restaurant_announcements.tour.add_text: Click this button to add a new announcement.
restaurant_customers.tour.table_text: This table shows all the customers for your restaurant. You can add, edit, or delete customers here.
restaurant_customers.tour.search_text: Use this box to search for customers by name, mobile number, etc.
restaurant_customers.tour.add_text: Click this button to add a new customer.
restaurant_customers.tour.import_text: Click this button to import customers from a file.
restaurant_job_offers.tour.table_text: This table shows all the job offers for your restaurant. You can add, edit, or delete job offers here.
restaurant_job_offers.tour.search_text: Use this box to search for job offers by position, description, etc.
restaurant_job_offers.tour.add_text: Click this button to add a new job offer.
restaurant_offers.tour.table_text: This is offers page. Here all offers that are added by the restaurant are listed.
restaurant_offers.tour.search_text: Use this box to search for offers by title, description, etc.
restaurant_offers.tour.add_text: By clicking this button, you can be able to add new offers. You can specify the title, description, discount percentage/price and applicable items.
restaurant_tables.tour.table_text: This page lists all the tables in your restaurant. You can add, edit, or delete tables here.
restaurant_tables.tour.search_text: Use this box to search tables by number or capacity.
restaurant_tables.tour.add_text: Click this button to add a new table by specifying its number and capacity.
restaurant_table_reservations.tour.table: This page lists all table reservations with slot timing and customer details.
restaurant_table_reservations.tour.searc: Use this box to search reservations by table number, customer, or booking info.
restaurant_table_reservations.tour.actio: Use these action buttons to approve, reject, or delete reservations.
restaurant_menu_items.tour.table_text: This table shows all the menu items for your restaurant. You can add, edit, or delete items here.
restaurant_menu_items.tour.search_text: Use this box to search for menu items by name, description, etc.
restaurant_menu_items.tour.add_text: Click this button to add a new menu item.
